question: There are 14,000,605 possible situations in the universe that we have viewed already, but there is only one in which you can solve this
The Hulk is at his angriest ever, and is wreaking havoc everywhere you can see. Go to this place to stop the destruction by trying to calm the Hulk down
Steve Rogers and Peter Parker were normal humans, before a visit here changed them into heroes. Get your superhuman problem solving skills from here
You found a huge cluster of gemstones, from which you must isolate the infinity stones. Go here to obtain the stones, and make all things perfectly balanced, as they should be.

Jason Stryker has fashioned a mystical world in front of you, and you need to figure out what is real and what is a dream. You stop for a bite at this place as you figure out a way to solve this dilemma.
Located in a quaint place, the Avengers decide to take a breather here as they grab a bite and figure out their plans to defeat Ultron. Look around you as you get this clue as an additional.

Loki has disappeared after he stole the tesseract, and he is nowhere to be found. You need to find Loki to retrieve the tesseract. Funnily enough, he’s in campus, and at a place all of you have definitely visited.
You have just discovered Captain America embedded in ice underwater, and need to rescue him. Go to this place to get assistance.
This centre was responsible for the creation of JARVIS, and then FRIDAY.
Thor and Hulk decided to fight in here, as it resembles the Grandmaster’s arena.
Eitri, Rocket and Groot forge Thor’s new hammer, Stormbreaker in this place, which can be hot enough to melt metal if required.
This place preserves everything in its storehouse of documents, even the codes of JARVIS after Ultron destroyed it, enabling Tony Stark to create Vision.
After the battle against Loki, Tony Stark goes to this place to enjoy a shawarma roll.

This place is an institution that teaches you to use and improve your powers, and to use them with ethics, as Professor X would do. Complete with recreation rooms and sports fields, it truly teaches you the A-Z of life.
The X-Men are required with William Stryker unleashing havoc on the mutants. As Beast, take control of the X-Jet, which is kept here.
The Wakandans used Vibranium to create their superior technology at this place. Yibambe!
The arc reactor that powered Stark Industries was originally built here, just so it could be cooled underwater in case of a malfunction.
Thor’s Mjolnir has just been discovered in a large, open field. Go here to find it. Are you worthy?
As a fan of the MCU, you go to this place to see the movies in all grandeur. Don’t wear shorts if you plan on going here!
You have won!!
